div.bibl: The Greek Press, July 3, 1929GAPA IN CHICAGO

body.p: Gapa, a Greek organization in America, is progressing by leaps and bounds in the Chicago area. The promoters of this organization are working towards the possibility of making this organization the chief strength of the Greek people.

We are told that this coming week a second chapter will be installed with certainty in Chicago and that many will wish to join. The consolidation of this new organization is due to the persistent demands of the Greek public.
